title: Livefyre Launches New Platform To Help Marketers Harness User Content
description: There’s been a big push from startups promising to help marketers and publishers take advantage of all the user-generated content that’s posted to social media, but Livefyre CEO Jordan Kretchmer suggested that one area has been relatively neglected — pushing UGC to a brand’s own website. Read More
